scripts.build-egret: cd .. & cd Egret & cd 4.x & npm run build & cd .. & cd .. & cd DragonBones
scripts.build-pixi: cd .. & cd Pixi & cd 4.x & npm run build & cd .. & cd Demos & tsc & cd .. & cd .. & cd DragonBones
scripts.build-phaser: cd .. & cd Phaser & cd 2.x & npm run build & cd .. & cd Demos & tsc & cd .. & cd .. & cd DragonBones
scripts.build-hilo: cd .. & cd Hilo & cd 1.x & npm run build & cd .. & cd Demos & tsc & cd .. & cd .. & cd DragonBones
scripts.build-cocos: cd .. & cd Cocos & cd 1.x & npm run build & cd .. & cd .. & cd DragonBones
scripts.build-all: npm run build-egret & npm run build-pixi & npm run build-phaser & npm run build-hilo & npm run build-cocos
